attributes.action: Financial support for start up businesses who have suffered due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Create a financial support package for all start up businesses that have suffered as a result of Coronavirus outbreak urgently.
attributes.background: Banks are not helping start ups and Financial support is urgently required for all the start up businesses who have suffered as a result of the COVID-19 outbreak.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced a support package to help start-ups.

You can find more information about this scheme here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/future-fund

You can find further information about support for businesses here: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/financial-support-for-businesses-during-coronavirus-covid-19

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
